comment.author: 22077905@N00
comment._content:
The phrase "Army and Navy Forever" are from the patriotic hymn, "Columbia, the Gem of the Ocean" ....

    But they to their colors prove true?
    The Army and Navy forever,
    Three cheers for the red, white, and blue,
    Three cheers for the red, white, and blue,
    Three cheers for the red, white, and blue,
    The Army and Navy for ever,
    Three cheers for the red, white and blue.
